name: Electro Dash
description:
Hello :)

Electro Dash is a 2D game made in 72 hours for the Ludum Dare 47. The theme was "Stuck in a loop".

Your goal is to survive the different levels by dodging shapes or dash through to the beat of the music.

Controls

ActionKeyboardGamepadMoveWASD / ZQSD / ArrowsLeft Stick DashSpacebarAPauseEscapeStart

Team

-> Asue : game developer

-> Oxalotte : composed all the musics
